function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate measurement of airborne viruses in real-time","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implement real-time monitoring technology for airborne viruses","Technologies":"Real-time airborne virus monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Decreased capability to measure sustainability in the long term","Impact":"Reduced ability to assess and mitigate long-term environmental impacts","Mitigation":"Implement robust and integrated sustainability assessment frameworks","Technologies":"Sustainability assessment tools and software","People":"Sustainability experts, environmental consultants, and policymakers","Owner":"Organizations and institutions advocating for sustainability practices"},{"Description":"Difficult integration among different sustainability criteria","Impact":"Limited ability to comprehensively assess environmental, social, and economic impacts","Mitigation":"Adopt integrated sustainability assessment frameworks and methodologies","Technologies":"Integrated sustainability assessment tools and frameworks","People":"Environmental, social, and economic stakeholders","Owner":"Organizations and institutions promoting sustainable development"}]}
